description: Takumi is the main character of the series. He is a very reclusive person and only attends school a bare number of times per week in order to fulfil graduation requirements. He often notes that he is not interested in girls in the three-dimensional world and avoids conversations with others whenever possible. He prefers to engage in watching anime, playing eroge, and massively multiplayer online role-playing games. He is a second-year student at Suimei Academy.
name: Nishijou Takumi
